inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The patient has no other medical condition.

inclusion.criterion: Refractory ascites or hepatic hydrothorax and plan for TIPS placement
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The patients is candidate for scoliosis surgery according to perioperative MEP monitoring

exclusion.criterion: Well-documented overt hepatic encephalopathy, either persistent or at the time of screening
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Except for coagulopathy and thrombocytopenia (decided on an individual basis)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Uncontrolled depression/anxiety disorder or use of antipsychotic drugs
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Active use of alcohol or illicit drugs
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a well-dressed and well-nourished adolescent who is alert and cooperative. The left shoulder is slightly higher than the right shoulder.
